attributes.action: to stay in office and continue the great work he's doing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the prime minister's actions on the economy are correct and beginning to 'bear fruit'. We also believe that he is a good man who has taken over at a time of great difficulty, but believe him to be the right man to deal with it.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
